name: FARMER DEBBUGING
description:
Save the farmers from the virus !

Farmer Debbuging is a shooter made during the GMTK gamejam 2021. 
A virus has invaded a farmer lifestyle simulator ! Help the developer to debug his game !
Hit as much glitched enemies as you can to save the famers from corruption ! 

Play by moving  with WASD ( qwerty ) or ZQSD ( azerty ), dash with the Space bar, and use the laser with the left mouse button. Be helped by your debugging friend joined to you ! Each time it'll touch a glitched farmer, it'll heal him in a shot !

A game made by Hugo SANTOS as developer and Yasmine RIBARDIERE as graphic designer.
